name: Shake Is Up 2 - To the Shakes and Beyond!
name_original: Shake Is Up 2 - To the Shakes and Beyond!
description:
The unexpected sequel to 'Shake Is Up', a celebration of SuperChocolateMilkshake's 11 year anniversary. A wish was made, and... the shake is even bigger than before! Help him get to the top and finish his anniversary milkshake!

Though the game has been simplified over test-iterations, it might still be too much of a challenge. Hopefully you'll be able to reach the end!
